messages.subject: twin stories
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/2/03 2:30:45 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/2/03 2:30:45 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< When they were reunited as adults the following "coincidences"
were noted: both developed sinus headaches at age ten, which later became
migraines, they used the same words to describe their pain. They had
identical pulse rates and blood pressure. >>

Trevor said he heard a story about twins that had apparently lived in
different neighborhoods. Both decided to mow their lawns on the same day and
both fell down from a heart attack at around the same time and ended up in
the same hospital. Weird if it's true. I don't know if we can find the actual
story..it was just something he was remembering.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
